org.apache.flink.runtime.blob

类 BlobClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.blob.BlobClient
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public final class BlobClient
extends Object
implements Closeable
    The BLOB client can communicate with the BLOB server and either upload (PUT), download (GET), or delete (DELETE) BLOBs.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      BlobClient(InetSocketAddress serverAddress)
      Instantiates a new BLOB client.

    • 方法概要

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void close() 
      void delete(BlobKey key)
      Deletes the BLOB identified by the given BLOB key from the BLOB server.
      void delete(org.apache.flink.api.common.JobID jobId, String key)
      Deletes the BLOB identified by the given job ID and key from the BLOB server.
      void deleteAll(org.apache.flink.api.common.JobID jobId)
      Deletes all BLOBs belonging to the job with the given ID from the BLOB server
      InputStream get(BlobKey blobKey)
      Downloads the BLOB identified by the given BLOB key from the BLOB server.
      InputStream get(org.apache.flink.api.common.JobID jobID, String key)
      Downloads the BLOB identified by the given job ID and key from the BLOB server.
      boolean isClosed() 
      BlobKey put(byte[] value)
      Uploads the data of the given byte array to the BLOB server in a content-addressable manner.
      BlobKey put(byte[] value, int offset, int len)
      Uploads data from the given byte array to the BLOB server in a content-addressable manner.
      BlobKey put(InputStream inputStream)
      Uploads the data from the given input stream to the BLOB server in a content-addressable manner.
      void put(org.apache.flink.api.common.JobID jobId, String key, byte[] value)
      Uploads the data of the given byte array to the BLOB server and stores it under the given job ID and key.
      void put(org.apache.flink.api.common.JobID jobId, String key, byte[] value, int offset, int len)
      Uploads data from the given byte array to the BLOB server and stores it under the given job ID and key.

      Uploads data from the given input stream to the BLOB server and stores it under the given job ID and key.

      Retrieves the BlobServer address from the JobManager and uploads the JAR files to it.
      static List<BlobKey> uploadJarFiles(InetSocketAddress serverAddress, List<org.apache.flink.core.fs.Path> jars)
      Uploads the JAR files to a BlobServer at the given address.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • BlobClient

        public BlobClient(InetSocketAddress serverAddress)
           throws IOException
        Instantiates a new BLOB client.
        参数:
        serverAddress - the network address of the BLOB server
        抛出:
        IOException - thrown if the connection to the BLOB server could not be established

    • 方法详细资料

      • close

        public void close()
           throws IOException
        指定者:
        close 在接口中 Closeable
        指定者:
        close 在接口中 AutoCloseable
        抛出:
        IOException

      • isClosed

        public boolean isClosed()

      • get

        public InputStream get(org.apache.flink.api.common.JobID jobID,
                       String key)
                throws IOException
        Downloads the BLOB identified by the given job ID and key from the BLOB server. If no such BLOB exists on the server, a FileNotFoundException is thrown.
        参数:
        jobID - the job ID identifying the BLOB to download
        key - the key identifying the BLOB to download
        返回:
        an input stream to read the retrieved data from
        抛出:
        IOException - thrown if an I/O error occurs during the download

      • get

        public InputStream get(BlobKey blobKey)
                throws IOException
        Downloads the BLOB identified by the given BLOB key from the BLOB server. If no such BLOB exists on the server, a FileNotFoundException is thrown.
        参数:
        blobKey - the BLOB key identifying the BLOB to download
        返回:
        an input stream to read the retrieved data from
        抛出:
        IOException - thrown if an I/O error occurs during the download

      • put

        public BlobKey put(byte[] value)
            throws IOException
        Uploads the data of the given byte array to the BLOB server in a content-addressable manner.
        参数:
        value - the buffer to upload
        返回:
        the computed BLOB key identifying the BLOB on the server
        抛出:
        IOException - thrown if an I/O error occurs while uploading the data to the BLOB server

      • put

        public BlobKey put(byte[] value,
                   int offset,
                   int len)
            throws IOException
        Uploads data from the given byte array to the BLOB server in a content-addressable manner.
        参数:
        value - the buffer to upload data from
        offset - the read offset within the buffer
        len - the number of bytes to upload from the buffer
        返回:
        the computed BLOB key identifying the BLOB on the server
        抛出:
        IOException - thrown if an I/O error occurs while uploading the data to the BLOB server

      • put

        public void put(org.apache.flink.api.common.JobID jobId,
                String key,
                byte[] value)
         throws IOException
        Uploads the data of the given byte array to the BLOB server and stores it under the given job ID and key.
        参数:
        jobId - the job ID to identify the uploaded data
        key - the key to identify the uploaded data
        value - the buffer to upload
        抛出:
        IOException - thrown if an I/O error occurs while uploading the data to the BLOB server

      • put

        public void put(org.apache.flink.api.common.JobID jobId,
                String key,
                byte[] value,
                int offset,
                int len)
         throws IOException
        Uploads data from the given byte array to the BLOB server and stores it under the given job ID and key.
        参数:
        jobId - the job ID to identify the uploaded data
        key - the key to identify the uploaded data
        value - the buffer to upload data from
        offset - the read offset within the buffer
        len - the number of bytes to upload from the buffer
        抛出:
        IOException - thrown if an I/O error occurs while uploading the data to the BLOB server

      • put

        public void put(org.apache.flink.api.common.JobID jobId,
                String key,
                InputStream inputStream)
         throws IOException
        Uploads data from the given input stream to the BLOB server and stores it under the given job ID and key.
        参数:
        jobId - the job ID to identify the uploaded data
        key - the key to identify the uploaded data
        inputStream - the input stream to read the data from
        抛出:
        IOException - thrown if an I/O error occurs while reading the data from the input stream or uploading the data to the BLOB server

      • put

        public BlobKey put(InputStream inputStream)
            throws IOException
        Uploads the data from the given input stream to the BLOB server in a content-addressable manner.
        参数:
        inputStream - the input stream to read the data from
        返回:
        the computed BLOB key identifying the BLOB on the server
        抛出:
        IOException - thrown if an I/O error occurs while reading the data from the input stream or uploading the data to the BLOB server

      • delete

        public void delete(BlobKey key)
            throws IOException
        Deletes the BLOB identified by the given BLOB key from the BLOB server.
        参数:
        key - the key to identify the BLOB
        抛出:
        IOException - thrown if an I/O error occurs while transferring the request to the BLOB server

      • delete

        public void delete(org.apache.flink.api.common.JobID jobId,
                   String key)
            throws IOException
        Deletes the BLOB identified by the given job ID and key from the BLOB server.
        参数:
        jobId - the job ID to identify the BLOB
        key - the key to identify the BLOB
        抛出:
        IOException - thrown if an I/O error occurs while transferring the request to the BLOB server

      • deleteAll

        public void deleteAll(org.apache.flink.api.common.JobID jobId)
               throws IOException
        Deletes all BLOBs belonging to the job with the given ID from the BLOB server
        参数:
        jobId - the job ID to identify the BLOBs to be deleted
        抛出:
        IOException - thrown if an I/O error occurs while transferring the request to the BLOB server

      • uploadJarFiles

        public static List<BlobKey> uploadJarFiles(ActorGateway jobManager,
                                           scala.concurrent.duration.FiniteDuration askTimeout,
                                           List<org.apache.flink.core.fs.Path> jars)
                                    throws IOException
        Retrieves the BlobServer address from the JobManager and uploads the JAR files to it.
        参数:
        jobManager - Server address of the BlobServer
        askTimeout - Ask timeout for blob server address retrieval
        jars - List of JAR files to upload
        抛出:
        IOException - Thrown if the address retrieval or upload fails

      • uploadJarFiles

        public static List<BlobKey> uploadJarFiles(InetSocketAddress serverAddress,
                                           List<org.apache.flink.core.fs.Path> jars)
                                    throws IOException
        Uploads the JAR files to a BlobServer at the given address.
        参数:
        serverAddress - Server address of the BlobServer
        jars - List of JAR files to upload
        抛出:
        IOException - Thrown if the upload fails
